snippet: Mr. Cumberbatch, who offers a contemporary portrayal of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's consulting detective, will play a major role in the sequel to J. J. Abrams' "Star Trek" movie - but just what role is a mystery all its own.
abstract: Mr. Cumberbatch, who offers a contemporary portrayal of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's consulting detective, will play a major role in the sequel to J. J. Abrams' "Star Trek" movie - but just what role is a mystery all its own.
lead_paragraph: The case of the vacant "Star Trek" role appears to be solved - or has it? The "Sherlock" star Benedict Cumberbatch, who offers a contemporary portrayal of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's consulting detective, Sherlock Holmes, on that BBC and PBS series, has been cast in a major role in a sequel to "Star Trek," the cinematic reimagining of James T. Kirk's outer-space adventures from J. J. Abrams and his crew. But just what role Mr. Cumberbatch will play in the new movie is a mystery all its own.

headline.main: 'Sherlock' Star Benedict Cumberbatch Is Clued In to 'Star Trek' Role
